instructions: Open the Alexa app on your phone. Swipe in from the left edge of the screen to open the menu. Select Skills & Games from the sidebar menu. Alexa skills enable 1 Alexa Skills enable 2 Alexa Skills enable 3 Source: Clinton Bowman / Android Central Select your desired skill . Tap on Enable to Use . Alexa Skills enable 4 Alexa Skills enable 5 Alexa Skills Enable 6 Source: Clinton Bowman / Android Central

Open the Alexa app on your phone. Swipe in from the left edge of the screen to open the menu. Select Skills & Games from the sidebar menu. Tap Your Skills . Alexa Skills enable 2 Alexa Skills enable 3 Alexa Skills enable 4 Source: Clinton Bowman / Android Central Tap the Skill you wish to disable. Tap on Disable Skill to remove the Skill. Tap Disable and your Skill will be removed. Alexa Skill disable 5 Alexa Skills disable 6 Alexa Skills disable 7 Source: Clinton Bowman / Android Central
